As Hellpeon speak Ultimo pulls his rifle back around, and already set on auto he pulled the trigger loosing 25 rounds of armour piercing bullets straight at Hellpeons back and from only a few feet.

nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> The dust seemignly had no effect on Hellpeon as the barrier of energy 
> around him repeled it. However he did hear the whizzing of Hacha 
> behind him and quickly spun around and grabed the end of the Nebulon 
> and gripped it tightly.
> 
> Hellpeon: "This beings training with us... has ended..."
> 
> And with those words Hellpeon released five beams of chaochitan 
> energy at Hacha who was in his hands and then sent one more ball of 
> the energy at it with his free hand.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > OOC:I had actually planned to use the dust before it settled but 
> thats ok. �
> > 
> > BIC:Ultimo kicks his one good foot up dust spraying out at Hellpeon 
> eyes, now pushing back iwth his foot rolls backwards again narrowly 
> missing the slice. �He then threw the gun around his shoulder so it 
> now rested on his back and thrust out his hand to nothing. �Hacha who 
> was now behind Hellpeon was sucked into the air by some force, 
> transforming to his energon axe mode and sailing through the air 
> directly at Hellpeons back, quite intent on going stragiht through 
> and into Ultimo's hand.
> > nbwrpg@y... wrote:
> > >
> 
> 
>
